channel.title: 317 graadoker or whatever
channel.description: if i put his total health over 100 he heals but when its 99 or below he doesnt how do i make it so it doesnt heal at all and this delta source. Healing looks like jad being healed

item.title: 317 graadoker or whatever
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

To make it so he doesn’t get healed, look for the ID of the NPC in npchandler.java or npc.java (I’m not sure what they are called & I’m not sure if this is right, but it should be) and remove anything that looks like it heals the monster. If you remove something wrong leave that notepad file open to ctrl+z.

Read full topic
